directions.step: Slice the green onions in a tablespoon of oil until they start to color.
Slice the mushrooms and add to the pan. Let cook on medium-low heat for 5-10 minutes and set aside.
Lightly beat the eggs (adding a little salt and a dash of vinegar helps the eggs set) with the cream in a bowl.
In the same pan, heat the second tablespoon of oil and then pour in the egg mixture.
Lightly stir the egg to allow the egg to cook evenly and when it starts to firm up, let cook for a few minutes undisturbed.
Distribute the cheese and mushroom mixture evenly over the eggs.
When the cheese starts melting, season the omelette with salt, pepper and Italian Seasoning, and then fold the omelette into thirds.
When your preferred level of doneness is achieved, serve.
